verses.verse: <S%G3972>Paul<s%> and <S%G5095>Timothy,<s%> bond-servants of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G40>saints<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> who are in <S%G5375>Philippi,<s%> <S%G4862>including<s%> the <S%G1985>overseers<s%> and deacons: <S%G1249><s%>
<S%G5485>Grace<s%> to you and <S%G1515>peace<s%> from <S%G2316>God<s%> our <S%G3962>Father<s%> and the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>
I <S%G2168>thank<s%> my <S%G2316>God<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> my <S%G3417>remembrance<s%> of you,
<S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G4160>offering<s%> <S%G1162>prayer<s%> with <S%G5479>joy<s%> in my <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1162>prayer<s%> for you <S%G3956>all,<s%>
in <S%G1909>view<s%> of your <S%G2842>participation<s%> in the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> from the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G891>until<s%> <S%G3568>now.<s%>

[For I am] <S%G3982>confident<s%> of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G846>very<s%> <S%G846>thing,<s%> that He who <S%G1728>began<s%> a <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%> in you will <S%G2005>perfect<s%> it <S%G891>until<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

For it is <S%G2531>only<s%> <S%G1342>right<s%> for me to <S%G5426>feel<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3778>way<s%> <S%G5228>about<s%> you <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> you in my <S%G2588>heart,<s%> since <S%G5037>both<s%> in my <S%G1199>imprisonment<s%> and in the <S%G627>defense<s%> and <S%G951>confirmation<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel,<s%> you <S%G3956>all<s%> are <S%G4791>partakers<s%> of <S%G5485>grace<s%> with me.
For <S%G2316>God<s%> is my <S%G3144>witness,<s%> <S%G5613>how<s%> I <S%G1971>long<s%> for you <S%G3956>all<s%> with the <S%G4698>affection<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

And <S%G3778>this<s%> I <S%G4336>pray,<s%> that your <S%G26>love<s%> may <S%G4052>abound<s%> <S%G2089>still<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> and <S%G3123>more<s%> in <S%G1922>real<s%> <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G144>discernment,<s%>

<S%G1519>so<s%> that you may <S%G1381>approve<s%> the things that are <S%G1308>excellent,<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> to be <S%G1506>sincere<s%> and <S%G677>blameless<s%> <S%G1519>until<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ;<s%>

having been <S%G4137>filled<s%> with the <S%G2590>fruit<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> which [comes] <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> to the <S%G1391>glory<s%> and <S%G1868>praise<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> I <S%G1014>want<s%> you to <S%G1097>know,<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> that my <S%G3588>circumstances<s%> <S%G2596><s%> have <S%G2064>turned<s%> out for the <S%G3123>greater<s%> <S%G4297>progress<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel,<s%>

<S%G5620>so<s%> that my <S%G1199>imprisonment<s%> in [the cause of] <S%G5547>Christ<s%> has <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G5318>well<s%> <S%G5318>known<s%> <S%G1722>throughout<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G4232>praetorian<s%> <S%G4232>guard<s%> and to <S%G3956>everyone<s%> <S%G3062>else,<s%>

and that <S%G4183>most<s%> of the <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G3982>trusting<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> because of my <S%G1199>imprisonment,<s%> <S%G5111>have<s%> <S%G4057>far<s%> <S%G4057>more<s%> <S%G5111>courage<s%> to <S%G2980>speak<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G870>without<s%> <S%G870>fear.<s%>

<S%G5100>Some,<s%> to be <S%G3303>sure,<s%> are <S%G2784>preaching<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> from <S%G5355>envy<s%> and <S%G2054>strife,<s%> but <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> from <S%G2107>good<s%> <S%G2107>will;<s%>
the <S%G3303>latter<s%> [do it] out of <S%G26>love,<s%> <S%G3609>knowing<s%> that I am <S%G2749>appointed<s%> for the <S%G627>defense<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel;<s%>

the <S%G3588>former<s%> <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2605>proclaim<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> out of <S%G2052>selfish<s%> <S%G2052>ambition,<s%> <S%G3756>rather<s%> <S%G3756>than<s%> from <S%G55>pure<s%> <S%G55>motives,<s%> <S%G3633>thinking<s%> to <S%G1453>cause<s%> me <S%G2347>distress<s%> in my <S%G1199>imprisonment.<s%>

<S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G1063>then<s%>? <S%G4133>Only<s%> that in <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5158>way,<s%> <S%G1535>whether<s%> in <S%G4392>pretense<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> in <S%G225>truth,<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is <S%G2605>proclaimed;<s%> and in <S%G3778>this<s%> I <S%G5463>rejoice,<s%> <S%G235>yes,<s%> and I will <S%G5463>rejoice.<s%>

For I <S%G3609>know<s%> that <S%G3778>this<s%> shall <S%G576>turn<s%> out for my <S%G4991>deliverance<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> your <S%G1162>prayers<s%> and the <S%G2024>provision<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%>

<S%G2596>according<s%> to my <S%G603>earnest<s%> <S%G603>expectation<s%> and <S%G1680>hope,<s%> that I shall not be <S%G153>put<s%> to <S%G153>shame<s%> in <S%G3762>anything,<s%> but [that] with <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3954>boldness,<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> shall <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3568>now,<s%> as <S%G3842>always,<s%> be <S%G3170>exalted<s%> in my <S%G4983>body,<s%> <S%G1535>whether<s%> by <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> by <S%G2288>death.<s%>
For to me, to <S%G2198>live<s%> is <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> and to <S%G599>die<s%> is <S%G2771>gain.<s%>

But <S%G1487>if<s%> [I am] to <S%G2198>live<s%> [on] in the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> [will mean] <S%G2590>fruitful<s%> <S%G2041>labor<s%> for me; and I do not <S%G1107>know<s%> <S%G5101>which<s%> to <S%G138>choose.<s%>

But I am hard-pressed from <S%G1417>both<s%> [directions,] <S%G2192>having<s%> the <S%G1939>desire<s%> to <S%G360>depart<s%> and be with <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> for [that] is <S%G4183>very<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G2909>better;<s%>
<S%G1161>yet<s%> to <S%G1961>remain<s%> on in the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> is <S%G316>more<s%> <S%G316>necessary<s%> for your <S%G1223>sake.<s%>

And <S%G3982>convinced<s%> of <S%G3778>this,<s%> I <S%G3609>know<s%> that I shall <S%G3306>remain<s%> and <S%G3887>continue<s%> with you <S%G3956>all<s%> for your <S%G4297>progress<s%> and <S%G5479>joy<s%> in the <S%G4102>faith,<s%>

<S%G2443>so<s%> that your <S%G2745>proud<s%> <S%G2745>confidence<s%> in me may <S%G4052>abound<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> my <S%G3952>coming<s%> to you <S%G3825>again.<s%>

<S%G3440>Only<s%> <S%G4176>conduct<s%> yourselves in a <S%G516>manner<s%> <S%G516>worthy<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ;<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that <S%G1535>whether<s%> I <S%G2064>come<s%> and <S%G3708>see<s%> you <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G548>remain<s%> <S%G548>absent,<s%> I may <S%G191>hear<s%> of you that you are <S%G4739>standing<s%> <S%G4739>firm<s%> in <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> with <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G5590>mind<s%> <S%G4866>striving<s%> <S%G4866>together<s%> for the <S%G4102>faith<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel;<s%>

in <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G3367>way<s%> <S%G4426>alarmed<s%> by [your] <S%G480>opponents<s%> â€“ <S%G3748>which<s%> is a <S%G1732>sign<s%> of <S%G684>destruction<s%> for them, but of <S%G4991>salvation<s%> for you, and that [too], from <S%G2316>God.<s%>

For to you it has been <S%G5483>granted<s%> for Christ's <S%G5228>sake,<s%> not <S%G3440>only<s%> to <S%G4100>believe<s%> in Him, but <S%G2532>also<s%> to <S%G3958>suffer<s%> for His <S%G5228>sake,<s%>
<S%G2192>experiencing<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G73>conflict<s%> <S%G3634>which<s%> you <S%G3708>saw<s%> in me, and <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G191>hear<s%> [to be] in me.
